00022 #include "../../constraints/constraint_abstract.h"
00023 
00024 struct ConstantVar
00025 {
00026   // TODO: This really only needs enough to get 'fail'
00027   StateObj* stateObj;
00028 
00029   static const BOOL isBool = false;
00030   static const BoundType isBoundConst = Bound_Yes;
00031 
00032   // Hmm.. no sure if it's better to make this true or false.
00033   BOOL isBound() const
00034   { return true;}
00035 
00036   DomainInt val;
00037 
00038   explicit ConstantVar(StateObj* _stateObj, DomainInt _val) : stateObj(_stateObj), val(_val)
00039   {}
00040 
00041   ConstantVar()
00042   {}
00043 
00044   ConstantVar(const ConstantVar& b) : stateObj(b.stateObj), val(b.val)
00045   {}
00046 
00047   BOOL isAssigned() const
00048   { return true;}
00049 
00050   DomainInt getAssignedValue() const
00051   { return val;}
00052 
00053   BOOL isAssignedValue(DomainInt i) const
00054   { return i == val; }
00055 
00056   BOOL inDomain(DomainInt b) const
00057   { return b == val; }
00058 
00059   BOOL inDomain_noBoundCheck(DomainInt b) const
00060   {
00061     D_ASSERT(b == val);
00062     return true;
00063   }
00064 
00065   DomainInt getMax() const
00066   { return val; }
00067 
00068   DomainInt getMin() const
00069   { return val; }
00070 
00071   DomainInt getInitialMax() const
00072   { return val; }
00073 
00074   DomainInt getInitialMin() const
00075   { return val; }
00076 
00077   void setMax(DomainInt i)
00078   { if(i<val) getState(stateObj).setFailed(true); }
00079 
00080   void setMin(DomainInt i)
00081   { if(i>val) getState(stateObj).setFailed(true); }
00082 
00083   void uncheckedAssign(DomainInt)
00084   { FAIL_EXIT(); }
00085 
00086   void propagateAssign(DomainInt b)
00087   {if(b != val) getState(stateObj).setFailed(true); }
00088 
00089   void decisionAssign(DomainInt b)
00090   { propagateAssign(b); }
00091 
00092   void removeFromDomain(DomainInt b)
00093   { if(b==val) getState(stateObj).setFailed(true); }
00094 
00095   void addTrigger(Trigger, TrigType)
00096   { }
00097 
00098 
00099   void addDynamicTrigger(DynamicTrigger* dt, TrigType, DomainInt = NoDomainValue BT_FUNDEF)
00100   {
00101 #ifdef BTWLDEF
00102       // XXX : Todo. Sensibly move this trigger...
00103 #endif
00104           releaseTrigger(stateObj, dt BT_CALL);
00105 //      dt->remove(getQueue(stateObj).getNextQueuePtrRef());
00106   }
00107 
00108   vector<AbstractConstraint*>* getConstraints() { return NULL; }
00109 
00110   void addConstraint(AbstractConstraint* c){ ; }
00111 
00112   DomainInt getBaseVal(DomainInt v) const
00113   {
00114     D_ASSERT(v == val);
00115     return val;
00116   }
00117 
00118   Var getBaseVar() const { return Var(VAR_CONSTANT, val); }
00119 
00120 #ifdef WDEG
00121   int getBaseWdeg() { return 0; } //wdeg is irrelevant for non-search var
00122 
00123   void incWdeg() { ; }
00124 #endif
00125 
00126   int getDomainChange(DomainDelta d)
00127   {
00128     D_ASSERT(d.XXX_get_domain_diff() == 0);
00129     return 0;
00130   }
00131 
00132   friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& o, const ConstantVar& constant)
00133   { return o << "Constant" << constant.val; }
00134 };
